dict.string: We hope you enjoyed your stay.

On departure, we ask you to leave the apartment in good condition. Dishes must be washed, trash must be collected and thrown into street containers. If the apartment will be left in a bad state it can be charged 40 euros for extra cleaning.

If it will be possible, your check-out time can be extended. On the day of your departure you don't need to call Elena again. Instead, please leave the keys on the table (all 2 sets) and shut the door when you will leave. Thank you for choosing our apartment.
